name: Friden
relicBonuses: After the bearer {ACTION_attacks}, it afflicts its target with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN}.
After the bearer afflicts an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN}, this relic {ACTION_attacks} it.
After the bearer {ACTION_casts} a single-target spell on an enemy, it afflicts the target with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE}.
After the bearer afflicts an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE}, this relic {ACTION_casts} a random single-target spell on it.
After the bearer afflicts an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN} and the enemy already has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE}, this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1976]Meteor Shower.
After this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1976] Meteor Shower, the bearer gains 10% {STAT_attack} or {STAT_intelligence}; whichever is lowest.
This relic and its bearer deal 30% more damage to enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN} or {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE}.
After the bearer afflicts an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE} and the enemy already has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN}, this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1976]Meteor Shower.
After the bearer afflicts an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE} or {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN}, the enemy loses one of its buffs.
At the start of the bearer's turn, if at least one enemy has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN} and one enemy has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE}, this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1968]Planets.
title: Goddess of Poison
